name: Ponderosa Aero Club, Inc.
about: Ponderosa Aero Club, Inc., established in 1974, is a premier flight training institution based at the Boise Air Terminal/Gowen Field in Boise, Idaho. We offer comprehensive flight education and training for private, instrument, commercial, and flight instructor ratings, as well as specialized courses such as backcountry and high-performance endorsements. Our fleet includes well-maintained Cessnas and Pipers, equipped with advanced GPS systems. Our experienced instructors provide one-on-one training, integrating ground school with flight instruction to enhance retention and efficiency. The club is known for its excellent safety record, competitive rental rates, and a close-knit community of members. We also host safety seminars and social activities throughout the year. Join us for top-notch aviation education and a supportive flying community.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Flight Instructor (CFI / FI)
Flight Instructor - Instrument (CFII / IRI)
Instrument Rating (IR)"]
